abstract: The owner of an exotic pet farm from which the animals escaped is found dead.
snippet: The owner of an exotic pet farm from which the animals escaped is found dead.
lead_paragraph: Lions, tigers, bears and other animals escaped from an exotic pet farm in Zanesville, Ohio, prompting the local authorities to issue a shoot-to-kill order that resulted in death for most of the animals. [Reuters]

headline.main: On Our Radar: Wild Animals Escape in Ohio
